activities: Solutions II manages US based client's global backup infrastructure. We provide the service remotely from the US. Our client's data does not leave the EU/EEA, we are backing up our clients EU/EEA sites locally, within the EU/EEA. We do not process personal data.
personaldata: Solutions II does not process any personal data. Solutions II does have remote access to our client's storage and backup infrastructure in the following countries: Netherlands, Germany, Hungary, United Arab Emeriates, Belgium and Russa.
privacyprograms: Solutions II has established a Data Privacy Policy that adheres to the Safe Harbor Framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce concerning the collection, use and retention of Personal Information from the European Union member countries and transfer of that data to the United States. Solutions II has certified that it adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles of notice, choice, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access and enforcement. A copy of our Data Privacy Policy can be found on our website.
